content: additional information in my angels i filled the head with a bit of toy stuffing but i think it may be small enough to maintain its shape even without that depending on the yarn used eta 28/12/2011 if you prefer to knit you might want to take a look at wullechneuel s knitted version 1 eta 23/08/2014 german version added eta 23/08/2014 there is now also a dutch version - with many many thanks to lilaloena 2 who provided the translation 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/weihnachtsengel---christmas-angel 2 http //www ravelry com/people/lilaloena
